it.polimi.se2018.mvc.controller.placementlogic

Class DiePlacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.controller.placementlogic.DiePlacer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiePlacerAlone, DiePlacerFirst, DiePlacerNoColor, DiePlacerNormal, DiePlacerNoValue

    public abstract class DiePlacer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class place a die in a specific square and check the condition. Used by the toolcard when move a die or by the standard placement of the turn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract boolean checkCondition()
      Check if a die could go in a specific square or not
      void placeDie()
      This method place the die of the placer

    • Method Detail

      • checkCondition

        protected abstract boolean checkCondition()
        Check if a die could go in a specific square or not
        Returns:
        true if the die could go, false otherwise

      • placeDie

        public void placeDie()
              throws InvalidPlacementException
        This method place the die of the placer
        Throws:
        InvalidPlacementException - because you can't place the die in that Square
